item.title: Thinking of getting into 508+
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:7, topic:330903”][quote author=Primadude link=topic=427274.msg3137812#msg3137812 date=1267216149]

If you wan’t stability, you’ll want a palidino base. However, one bulby base has been built to fix stability and resets.

In that source it also has a tutorial for how to switch from 317 to 508.

Servers that are based off of Palidino76’s base aren’t very stable; RS2HD is the best way to go if you want stability, however, most 508 servers nowadays that have content aren’t based off of RS2HD.
[/quote]

z508 is best[/quote]

Zach is very good at adding content, but the stability of the server suffers. Hence things like random trade dc’s with lost items, and the shops don’t even work with multiple players. I might release DSv8, which fixes all of those things and has party room and general store. (Never worked correctly on a 508 before :P)

Read full topic

[/quote]

z508 is best[/quote]

For content yes, but it lacks stability substantially.
